main.model

Class SuperSimpleStocksModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • main.model.SuperSimpleStocksModel

  • public class SuperSimpleStocksModel
extends java.lang.Object
    The SimpleStockModel class persists all the data held for the application. Calculations using both trades and stocks are defined within this class.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    andersarchibald

    • Method Detail

      • initialiseStocks

        public void initialiseStocks()
        The intialise stocks method populates the application with an initial set of data. No trades are created, only the specified Stocks.

      • calculateStockPrice

        public double calculateStockPrice(Stock stock)
        This method calculates the stock price based on trades made in the last 15 minutes.
        Parameters:
        stock - The stock for which a price must be found.
        Returns:
        The stock price.

      • calculateGBCEAllShareIndex

        public double calculateGBCEAllShareIndex()
        Returns:
        The all share index value.

      • addTrade

        public boolean addTrade(Stock stock,
                        int quantity,
                        double price,
                        TradeType type)
        This method executes a stock trade, based upon the stock selected, the quantity of stocks, the stock price entered and the type of trade (BUY or SELL).
        Parameters:
        stock - This is the selection index of the stock to be traded.
        quantity - The number of stocks to be traded.
        price - The price of the trade.
        type - The trade type BUY or SELL.
        Returns:
        Trade success boolean.
